cooking_method: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. Fry onions and garlic. Add chicken and cook until tender. Boil rice separately. Layer rice and chicken. Bake in oven for 30 minutes.
Slice eggplants. Mix turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and salt. Coat the eggplant slices with the spice mix. Fry in oil until golden brown. Serve hot.

Soak chana dal for 2 hours. Boil until tender. Mix beef mince, boiled chana dal, onions, green chilies and ginger paste. Make small patties. Fry in oil until golden brown. Serve hot with mint chutney.
